title: More protests underway against kerosene & fuel shortages
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest is currently underway by people who are blocking the Colombo-Kurunegala road in the Ambagahawatta area in Minuwangoda.
Our correspondents stated that the area residents are protesting against the fuel shortage.
Meanwhile, another group is currently protesting near a filing station in the Ederamulla area in Wattala, demanding kerosene.
Residents say the area has not received kerosene for three weeks now.
Nearly 90 arrested in connection with 9th May events: Police
